name: Dark theme for CardBook
css:
.cardbookBackgroundColorClass tabbox,
.cardbookBackgroundColorClass tabpanels,
.cardbookBackgroundColorClass tabpanel,
.cardbookBackgroundColorClass grid,
.cardbookBackgroundColorClass caption,
.cardbookBackgroundColorClass listbox,
.cardbookBackgroundColorClass textbox[readonly="true"],
.cardbookBackgroundColorClass textbox[link="true"],
.cardbookBackgroundColorClass textbox[link="true"]:hover,
#mainHbox,
.cardbookHorizontalSplitter,
.cardbookBackgroundColorClass treechildren::-moz-tree-row(selected)
{
	background-color: #101010 !important; /* #CCE0FF */
}

.cardbookBackgroundColorClass textbox,
.cardbookBackgroundColorClass treechildren,
.cardbookBackgroundColorClass treechildren::-moz-tree-row(odd),
.cardbookBackgroundColorClass treechildren::-moz-tree-row(even),
.cardbookBackgroundColorClass listitem,
.cardbookBackgroundColorClass menulist,
.cardbookBackgroundColorClass menupopup,
.cardbookTreeChildrenAccountClass treechildren,
.cardbookTreeChildrenAccountClass treechildren::-moz-tree-row(odd),
.cardbookTreeChildrenAccountClass treechildren::-moz-tree-row(even),
.cardbookTreeChildrenCardsClass treechildren,
.cardbookTreeChildrenCardsClass treechildren::-moz-tree-row(odd),
.cardbookTreeChildrenCardsClass treechildren::-moz-tree-row(even),
.cardbookTreeChildrenCardClass treechildren,
.cardbookTreeChildrenCardClass treechildren::-moz-tree-row(odd),
.cardbookTreeChildrenCardClass treechildren::-moz-tree-row(even),
.cardbookVerticalSplitter
{
	background-color: #060606 !important; /* #E6F0FF */
}
